description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76047-RHABDOMYOSARCOMA AND RELATED NEOPLASMS: Resection or biopsy.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: TUMOR_SITE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify tumor site.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_GREAT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Greatest Size.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (length).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (width).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Tumor Size.

columns.name: HISTO_TYPE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify histologic type.

columns.name: MARGIN_UNITS_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Margin Units.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


mm


cm

columns.name: SPECIFIC_MARGINS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specific Margins.

columns.name: DISTNT_METASTASIS_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Distant Metastasis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not applicable


cM0 (i+): No clinical or radiographic evidence of distant metastasis


pM0: No distant metastasis


pM1: Distant metastasis


pM1a: Intraperitoneal metastasis beyond the right lower quadrant, including pseudomyx


pM1b: Nonperitoneal metastasis


pM1: Distant detectable metastasis as determined by classic clinical


pM1 (IVB): Distant metastasis


pM1a: Separate tumor nodule(s) in contralateral lung; tumor with pleural nodules or


pM1b: Distant metastases outside the lung / pleura


pM1: Distant metastasis (documented in this specimen)


pM1a: Metastasis in skin, subcutaneous tissues, or distant lymph nodes


pM1b: Metastasis to lung


pM1c: Metastasis to all other visceral sites or distant metastasis at any site


pM1a: Nonregional lymph node(s)


pM1b: Bone(s)


pM1c: Other site(s) with or without bone disease


pM1: Metastasis to sites other than CNS


pM1a: Single lesion


pM1b: Multiple lesions


pM1c: CNS metastasis


pM1d: Discrete mass(es) without leptomeningeal and / or CSF involvement


pM1e: Leptomeningeal and / or CSF involvement


pM1a: Non-regional lymph nodes or pulmonary metastasis


pM1b: Distant metastasis other than to nonregional lymph nodes and lungs


pM1a (III): Tumor extends to the lungs with or without genital tract involvement


pM1b (IV): Tumor involves other metastatic sites


pM1a: Largest diameter of the largest metastasis 3 cm or less


pM1b: Largest diameter of the largest metastasis 3.1-8.0 cm


pM1c: Largest diameter of the largest metastasis 8 cm or more


pM1a: Lung


pM1b: Metastasis involving distant sites other than lung (including skip metastases)


Distant Metastasis present (includes metastasis to lymph nodes)

columns.name: DSTNT_METASTATIS_ST
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Distant Metastasis Sites.

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_AMPU_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specimen Procedure Amputation Specify.

columns.name: ALVEOLAR_PERCENTAGE
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Type Percentage of Alveolar.

columns.name: EMBRYONAL_PERCENT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Type Percentage of Embryonal.

columns.name: SOFT_TISSUE_TMR_SP
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Depth for Soft Tissue-Based Tumors Specify.

columns.name: ANAPLASIA_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Anaplasia. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not identified


Focal (single or few scattered anaplastic cells)


Diffuse (clusters or sheets of anaplastic cells)


Indeterminate


Cannot be assessed

columns.name: RHABDOMYO_GRP_SYS_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: The Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study Postsurgical Clinical Grouping System. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not applicable


Cannot be assessed

columns.name: RHABDOMY_GRP_SYS_SP
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: The Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study Postsurgical Clinical Grouping System Specify.

columns.name: STAGING_RHABDOMYO_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Modified Site, Size, Metastasis Staging for Rhabdomyosarcoma (for relevant stage). 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not applicable


Cannot be assessed 


Stage I


Stage II


Stage III


Stage IV

columns.name: RHABDOM_STAGE_SPEC
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Modified Site, Size, Metastasis Staging for Rhabdomyosarcoma Specify.

columns.name: DIST_SARCOMA_MARGIN
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Distance of Sarcoma from Closest Margin.

columns.name: LYMPH_ND_NUM_XMD
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the number of lymph nodes examined.

columns.name: LYM_ND_NUM_IVLV
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify number of lymph nodes involved.

columns.name: NO_REGION_LYMPH_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Lymph Nodes No Regional Lymph Nodes. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Metastatic involvement of regional lymph nodes not identified


Regional lymph node metastasis present

columns.name: RHAB_GRP_SYS_I_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: The Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study Postsurgical Clinical Grouping System Group I. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


A Localized tumor, confined to site of origin, completely resected


B Localized tumor, infiltrating beyond site of origin, completely resected

columns.name: RHAB_GRP_SYS_II_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: The Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study Postsurgical Clinical Grouping System Group II. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


A Localized tumor, gross total resection, but with microscopic residual disease


B Locally extensive tumor (spread to regional lymph nodes), completely resected


C locally extensive tmr, gross total resection, but microscopic residual disease

columns.name: RHAB_GRP_SYS_III_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: The Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study Postsurgical Clinical Grouping System Group III. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


A Localized or locally extensive tumor, gross residual disease after biopsy only


B Localized or locally extensive tumor, gross residual disease after major resection

columns.name: RHAB_GRP_SYS_IV_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: The Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study Postsurgical Clinical Grouping System Group IV. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Any size primary tumor, with or without regional lymph node, with distant metastases
